items.headline: No jobs report today. But that may not be the worst data delay due to the federal shutdown.
items.summary_en: Crucial reports on U.S. inflation, job creation and unemployment are set to be delayed a week or more due to the government shutdown — and there’s even a danger that some inflation reports might not be produced at all.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Stunning $110 million Malibu estate once owned by TV legend Johnny Carson is for sale
items.summary_en: TV legend Johnny Carson’s former longtime California dwelling has hit the market for $110 million—two decades after he died in 2005.

items.headline: These AI ‘loser’ stocks were left for dead. Now it might be their turn to rally.

items.headline: Cracker Barrel drops marketing firm behind disastrous logo refresh, raising further questions about future plans
items.summary_en: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc. on Thursday said it would stop working with the consultancy that advised it on a logo change and restaurant overhaul that backfired over the summer, raising further questions about the Americana-themed restaurant chain’s path forward.
